message:
If you are having small websites on Windows host and want something fast without paying too much, I highly recommend the SSD VPS from these guys. I'm moving my stuff (from non-SSD at the same company) to it soon.

RT @Meligy: .@SoftsysHosting have good discounts on their SSD VPS today if u r interested http://t.co/4nxg25E1I0
3.5GB RAM /$40 is good deal
story: Meligy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Windows Hosting, VPS Hosting, Dedicated Servers Hosting - SoftsysHosting.com
caption: softsyshosting.com
description: Best Windows hosts, Softsys Hosting: Offering Latest Web Hosting Solutions from Windows VPS, Linux VPS, Cloud VPS, Dedicated Servers, Reseller Packages and more

data.message: The offer is still on if you want to catch it at the last minute.
